name: GetUpfrontQuoteLineItems
description:
Retrieve computed upfront line items from a quote.

Use this tool to get the computed upfront line items for a specific quote from Stripe. Ideal for viewing details of the initial line items associated with a quote, including accessing a URL for the full list if needed.

parameters.name: quote_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the quote for which to retrieve upfront line items. This ID is required to specify the quote in context.

parameters.name: pagination_ending_before_id
parameters.description: A cursor indicating the last object ID to fetch the previous page in a paginated list of upfront line items.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: fields_to_expand
parameters.description: A list of fields to expand in the response for more detailed information. Each entry should be a string representing a field.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: max_line_items_to_return
parameters.description: The maximum number of line items to retrieve, between 1 and 100. Default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_starting_object_id
parameters.description: An object ID used to fetch the next page of results in pagination, such as `obj_foo`.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Stripe API.
